participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, always looking for the next thrill.
participant_1.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.name: Fatima
participant_2.personality: Resilient and thoughtful, with a strong sense of justice.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was of age.

content.text: Hey! I like donuts ? What about you?
